title: Why do so many people on Ascension forget to lock in and accidentally dodge???
body: Its not even a serious in-game issue but theres a cesspool of blind pick subhumans who forget you're meant to actually lock in your choice, seriously, this has happened way too much and I'm sick of it. Get rid of the kick if someone picks their champion but doesnt lock in, theres no reason for it and it just makes queue times unbearably long.

replies.body: I agree - I am one of the blind pick subhumans who forgot to lock in my choice, and now I have to wait out the dodge penalty. If I have a champ selected, why can't it be auto-locked when the timer runs out?

yeah this would be a definite improvement to the client and experience in general, especially since alot of the time I'd like to spend the last moments before a match checking my runes and looking up info about my opponents or tips about playing a new lane matchup I haven't yet experienced.
